item.title: HUGO/OX-HUGO INSTALL AND CONFIGURATION
item.description: SETUP HUGO Go-lang-1.11 is necessary for Hugo. In Ubuntu-18.04 we need to install it from the repository below Check the following page https://www.kengrimes.com/ox-hugo-tutorial/ Start with this one https://www.zcl.space/tools/my-blog-workflow/ http://ianfitzpatrick.eu/post/blog-setup/ org-mode / emacs / hugo (academic) ox-hugo sudo add-apt-repository ppa:longsleep/golang-backports sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install golang-go After that we can install the latest hugo binary (v0.53) wget https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.53/hugo_0.53_Linux-64bit.deb sudo dpkg -i hugo_0.53_Linux-64bit.deb Hugo themes can be downloaded directlry into the working directory
